pullRequest.title: [#9382] Add example for create feedback session form to help page for instructors
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of #9382
Outline of Solution
Added in the create new feedback session form. Screenshot shown below:

Also, the box displaying the course ID seems to be not displaying in full for the form. It is a simple fix to the bootstrap classes in the template files. Should I resolve it within this PR or open another issue/PR for this?

commit.message: Add example form to create session in instructor help page
Add test skeleton to instructor help session page

nodes.bodyText: If you create those stub just to make the test passing, I think you can import SessionEditFormModule here to get it passed.
And declaring ExampleBoxComponent should also be fine.

I think somehow you may also want to add a isDisplayOnly or disabled field to the component unless you want the form to be interactive (which is also acceptable as the event thrown by the component is ignored).
You can refer to https://github.com/TEAMMATES/teammates/pull/10071/files for examples.

commit.message: Use original ExampleBox instead of stub for test
